string-array.name: tips_array
string-array.item: "Copycat apps are dangeous Scan your phone with Sabre Tulong"
"Set Smart update in WLAN to keep apps most updated"
"Connect the USB cable to manage your phone on PC"
"Updating apps in data-saving mode can save 92% data traffic"
"You can ignore the updates for apps that you don't want to update"
"LenovoStore games zone Numerous gifts for you to pick up"
